title: See it for Myself
special: Menas must burn a Foe at a Wilderness location. When drawn, may place at the bottom of the achievement deck and draw again.

title: Stronger Together
special: Must cooperate on a test with Menas and get a 4 or higher. When drawn, may place at the bottom of the achievement deck and draw again.

title: Wine. And Women. And Men.
task: Add at least 1 progress to any Diplomat.
special: When drawn, may place at the bottom of the achievement deck and draw again.

title: Starting the Workshop
special: When drawn, may place at the bottom of the achievement deck and draw again.

title: An Outpost in the Dark Forest
Incant a Ward Against the Deathless
A Kindness for the Captive Shadow
special: Unlock and play the Necromancer when this achievement is active.

title: Discuss the Empire's Military Strategy
special: May not fulfill during the epilogue.

title: Breaking the Web
special: Unlock and play the Weaver of Secrets when this achievement is active.

title: Secrets Revealed
special: Unlock and play The Subtect when this achievement is active.

title: The Leader's Favor
special: Unlock and play Zarrah and High Society when this achievement is active.
